submission:
from typing import List
from collections import defaultdict
from bisect import bisect_left

class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        diffs = defaultdict(list)
        vals = []
        n = len(nums)
        j=n-1
        n = n // 2
        
        for i in range(n):
           
            d = abs(nums[i] - nums[j])
            x = max(nums[i], nums[j], k - nums[i], k - nums[j])
            diffs[d].append(x)
            vals.append(x)
            j-=1

        ans = n
        vals.sort()

        for d, xs in diffs.items():
            changes = bisect_left(vals, d)
            changes = changes * 2 + (n - changes)

            for x in xs:
                changes -= 2 if x < d else 1

            ans = min(ans, changes)

        return ans
